lore: Plague Doctors have a strange fondness for traveling the world, curing any sick creature they find.\n\nWhen a Plague Alchemist finds a wounded person, it does not merely heal their wounds. With a whisper, it asks the patient whether they were caused by another. With just a description, this creature finds the perpetrator and waits for them to become distracted. Then it pours the contents of its test tube into a glass. When drunk, the strange liquid causes the same injuries on the aggressor's body.
menagerieDialog: Bend over, grab your ankles, and cough!
(It points at you, then mimes a drinking motion. Unsure about how to respond, you pretend to be distracted by another one of your creatures.)
(It hands you a vial full of purple liquid. You shake your head as if to reject its offer, and it glances downward with a sad look on its face.)
(It picks its nose, but it's not really gross because its nose is a mask. Pretty neat.)
(It was busy mixing a potion before you startled it and caused it to drop its vials on the ground.)
name: Plague Alchemist
